phrases: The salinity in the Narunami area around noon is expected to be 57 per mill.
Around 6PM, it will rise to 60 per mill.
the water temperature is expected to drop,
and the temperature of Shioshishio is expected to drop to 15 degrees.
Next is the weather on the surface.
It actually falls on the surface.
The Shioshishio Peninsula will continue to be sunny.
It was different, even a bit creepy.
I wonder if everyone in Shishio knows it fell on the surface.
As soon as they find out,
they will say it is Ooshi's fault because they refused to do the Ofunehiki
and the Sea God is meting out divine punishment.
Knowing how Dad and the others are, I am sure of it.
I am sure that Dad is worried about you.
Hikari, I think you should go home after all.
I got a whole bunch of snow and made this.
It is a snow sea slug!
Did you know what it was, Aka-chan?
It is even better if you add these.
I wonder if it will last till Daddy gets home.
It will not melt that fast.
I wonder if Daddy will know what it is...
I heard that saltflake snow fell on the surface...
So it is going to keep getting colder the way the prophecy said?
We have not forgotten about the Sea God.
But have not you noticed that the sacred fire's going out faster lately?
Did you find out the reason?
There is only one reason I have asked you all to gather here today...
I would like to talk to you about the calamity that approaches us.
Looks like the snow did not fall for very long.
I wonder if the Sea God is mad...
Dad better not be drinking a lot and skipping meals just because I am not there.
Actually, what is he doing about food?
I was trying to figure out where to fix it first.
What are you guys doing here so early?
Well, we were sort of thrown out.
We were told that adults had an important meeting to go to,
so we should head to school early.
I wonder if it has to do with the saltflake snow falling on the surface.
They think it is okay to keep everything a secret from kids.
We will be doing the Ofunehiki!
We really want to do this to the end.
Well, we might as well finish.
And we feel bad for Ojoshi-sama.
I will ask my Gramps for a boat to use.
We can do this, right, Sensei?
Let us all make sure it is a success no matter what!
Once we are done, I will definitely treat you guys to ramen this time!
Gramps said we could use this.
But it is smaller than I thought.
We should probably reinforce it first.
You are putting too much into it.
You are going to get hurt like that.
I think we are all getting hungry.
Then I will go make us something!
I will go get some things from Saya Mart!
You better not be doing this just so you can have a snack.
I am going to support her.
You are just going to get fat!
I wonder what did be good...
Something that will keep you warm is probably best.
Something warm and from the sea...
By the way, has Hikari said anything?
Like about the sea or home.
I wonder if Hikari's not worried about Dad.
They both care about each other,
but this is not going well...
Tsumugu also did that quite a bit when he first came here.
Tsumugu-kun was not born in this house?
He came here on his own when he was nine.
Why did he come by himself?
His parents live in the city.
So Tsumugu-kun has always been Tsumugu-kun since he was little...
I have thought that Tsumugu-kun is really good
at finding himself and things that are around him.
I am sure he found his love for the sea when he was young, too.
I think that is why he chose to come here.
Because he knows what is precious to him.
Apparently Cafe Triangle is the place for meets.
It is a place where guys and girls are friendly with each other!
Looks like your mouth's working just fine,
I am going to head back to school and get some tools,
so could you see if there is wood in the back for reinforcing?
All right, I am counting on you little ladies.
Want me to help you paint?
I am okay now, do not worry.
Do you still need a sea slug?
I do not need one anymore.
Does that mean you are giving up on Hikari?
Because I have to change... so...
So that is what change means to you?
I mean, that is what it means to become an adult, right?
You cannot just keep thinking about yourself,
and you have to keep moving forward.
So that is why you are neglecting your feelings.
Because you cannot forgive how you are right now.
I do not dislike how you are right now.
I am not feeling well, so I am going home.
So he makes you make expressions like that.
Hey, do you need this anymore?
We are already done for the day.
Where did Chisaki and Kaname go?
I wonder if they had something to do.
That is the shumai for the inside of the microwave.
Do you know how hard I worked on that thing?
It is seafood and pork soup!
Putting pork in seafood soup is wrong.
I thought it would be nice if things that were raised in the sea and on the surface got along.
That is for making my knees buckle.
That is different for a lot of reasons...
I am here right now because you were there for me, Hii-kun.
What are you being all serious fo
You feel reassured when someone is with you.
If it is hard for you to go back home, I will go with you.
I feel reassured when you are next to me,
and I am sure your dad feels the same.
And I know you do, too.
If you can tell each other you care about each other, you will become stronger!
I said that I would support her...
But I do not think I can control myself...
Manaka, you cannot go to the surface anymore.
Now if you will open your textbook to page 48
I could not really sleep well last night, and so...
So at least you showed up, Hikari.
Well, all of the Shioshishio kids did not show up today.
I tried to contact them but could not reach them.
Those adults are trying to stop the Ofunehiki again!
I will go back to the village and settle this once and for all!
I am going to tell them!
I am going to tell all the old guys and Dad...
Did something happen to the village?
Let us hurry and go see Uroko-sama.
Why do I have to go see Uroko-sama?
Manaka, you were told not to leave your house.
Since I was gone, the village totally seems...
When I got home last night,
there were a lot of adults waiting and they said not to go up to the surface again.
My dad would not let me out of the house.
Do not go up to the surface?
That is just what they said when I got back.
They said it was dangerous on the surface.
So they said that Chii-chan and Kaname...
that none of us could leave the village.
Then why did you come outside by yourself?
Because I had to tell you, Hii-kun!
Even if we care about each other...
Manaka's feelings and my feelings are different.
The way I feel about Manaka...
Because I had to tell you.
What is going to happen on the surface?
The world becomes more and more gray...
The humans will forget the Sea God...
This is the story of humans themselves...
The humans will not be able to bear the cold that is about to come.
Episode Ten: The Saltflake Snow Falls and Falls
You need to make your choice.
